宵山: (よいやま) - small festival on the eve of the main festival (esp. of the Gion festival)
宵月: (よいづき) - evening moon; moon that can only be seen in the early hours of the night (esp. from the 2nd to the 7th of the eight month)
宵祭: (よいまつり) - small festival held the night before a full festival
宵祭り: (よいまつり) - small festival held the night before a full festival
宵積み: (よいづみ) - goods loaded in the afternoon for delivery the following morning
宵越しの銭は持たない: (よいごしのぜにはもたない) - spending a day's revenue within the day; not being attached to money (like a true Tokyoite)
家: (ka/ke/ie/ya) - house , house, residence, dwelling; family, household; lineage, family name
家々: (いえいえ) - every house or family
家じゅう: (いえじゅう) - whole family/all (members of) family; all over the house
家だに: (いえだに) - tropical rat mite (Ornithonyssus bacoti)
家に帰る: (いえにかえる) - to come back home; to go back home
家に還る: (いえにかえる) - to come back home; to go back home
家の人: (うちのひと) - my husband; one's family
家の向き: (いえのむき) - aspect of a house
家の子郎党: (いえのころうとう) - followers; adherents
家の裏: (いえのうら) - back of the house
家の辺りに: (いえのあたりに) - around the house
家をあける: (うちをあける) - to be away from home; to be out of the house
家を建てる: (いえをたてる) - to build a house
家を畳む: (いえをたたむ) - to shut up one's house
家を空ける: (うちをあける) - to be away from home; to be out of the house
家を継ぐ: (いえをつぐ) - to succeed to a house
家を興す: (いえをおこす) - to raise the reputation of one's family; to found a house
家ダニ: (いえダニ) - tropical rat mite (Ornithonyssus bacoti)
家デン: (イエデン) - home telephone; home phone number
家並: (やなみ) - row of houses; every door
家並み: (やなみ) - row of houses; every door
家中: (いえじゅう) - whole family/all (members of) family; all over the house
家主: (いえあるじ) - (やぬし, いえぬし only) landlord/landlady; house owner/home owner/head of the household
家事: (かじ) - housework/domestic chores; family affairs/household matters
家事一切: (かじいっさい) - (yoji) all the domestic (housekeeping) chores
家事手伝い: (かじてつだい) - domestic help; domestic helper; domestic servant; maid
家事見習: (かじみならい) - (yoji) apprenticeship in the running of a household; prospective bride who undertakes an apprenticeship to learn housekeeping
家事見習い: (かじみならい) - (yoji) apprenticeship in the running of a household; prospective bride who undertakes an apprenticeship to learn housekeeping
家事都合: (かじつごう) - family reasons; personal reasons
家付き: (いえつき) - attached or belonging to a house
家付きの娘: (いえつきのむすめ) - daughter of the home; unmarried woman who owns (the future rights to) a home
家付き娘: (いえつきむすめ) - daughter of the home; unmarried woman who owns (the future rights to) a home
家付娘: (いえつきむすめ) - daughter of the home; unmarried woman who owns (the future rights to) a home
家作: (かさく) - making house; house for rent
家元: (いえもと) - head of a school (of music, dance); head family of a school
家兎: (いえうさぎ) - domestic rabbit; tame rabbit
家具等: (かぐとう) - furniture and the like
家内: (やうち) - (かない only)  (my) wife; inside the home/one's family
家内一同: (かないいちどう) - (yoji) all one's family; one's whole family
家内中: (かないじゅう) - whole family; all the members of one's family
家内安全: (かないあんぜん) - safety (well-being) of one's family; peace and prosperity in the household
家内工業: (かないこうぎょう) - household or cottage industry
家出: (いえで) - running away from home; leaving home
家出少女: (いえでしょうじょ) - runaway girl
家務: (かむ) - family affairs/family business; steward in charge of the affairs of a samurai family (middle ages)
家台: (やたい) - cart (esp. a food cart)/stall/stand; festival float/portable shrine dedicated to a god and shaped like a house/dancing platform; stage prop fashioned after a large building; framework (of a house, etc.); house (esp. a small and miserable house)
家号: (やごう) - name of store/trade name; stage name (e.g. of actor)
家司: (いえづかさ) - steward in charge of the affairs of nobles of the third rank and higher (from the middle of the Heian period); administrative position (Kamakura and Muromachi periods)
家名: (かめい) - family name/house name; family honour/family honor
家塾: (かじゅく) - (historical) government-backed school operated by a scholar out of his home
家声: (かせい) - honour of the family; honor of the family
家宅侵入罪: (かたくしんにゅうざい) - (crime of) trespassing; housebreaking
家宅捜査: (かたくそうさ) - premises search; household search
家宅捜索: (かたくそうさく) - premises search; household search
家宅捜索令状: (かたくそうさくれいじょう) - search warrant
家家: (いえいえ) - every house or family
家屋台帳: (かおくだいちょう) - house or housing registry
家屋敷: (いえやしき) - estate; homestead; house and land (it stands on); messuage
家常茶飯: (かじょうさはん) - (yoji) everyday occurrence; commonplace of life; nothing out of the ordinary
家庭ごみ: (かていごみ) - household garbage; household trash; household refuse
家庭を持つ: (かていをもつ) - to have a family (e.g. wife or husband and children); to raise a family
家庭を顧みない: (かていをかえりみない) - thinking little of one's family
